title: Orientation: Your First Shift
description: Introduces core expectations, mindset, and first-shift behavior.

steps.text: Welcome. Before anything else, take a breath. Confidence starts here.
Your goal in the first five minutes is simple: make the table feel acknowledged and taken care of.
Approach the table within 30 seconds, smile, and introduce yourself.

steps.prompt: Why do you think speed matters so much in the first interaction?

steps.question: What is the main goal of the first five minutes?

steps.correct_text: Exactly. Confidence and clarity come first.
steps.incorrect_text: Not quite. The priority is setting tone and trust, not rushing the order.
